fullText: The current Broadway revival of Glengarry Glen Ross is a monument to the idea that great acting can make even familiar material feel urgent and new.
dtliExcerpt: The current Broadway revival of Glengarry Glen Ross is a monument to the idea that great acting can make even familiar material feel urgent and new.
